scripts.env: env-cmd -f ../../.env bash -c "aws sts get-caller-identity --profile \$AWS_PROFILE --no-cli-pager >/dev/null 2>&1 || aws sso login --profile \$AWS_PROFILE" && env-cmd -f ../../.env
scripts.dev: pnpm run env -- sst bind "IS_LOCAL=true next dev"
scripts.dev:staging: pnpm run env -- sst bind --stage=staging "IS_LOCAL=true next dev"
